summary: This film is adapted from the novel of Ah Cheng. During the Cultural Revolution (1966-1976), a young man is assigned to teach in village school.
cast: Yuan Xie|Xuewen Yang|Shaohua Chen|Caimei Zhang|Guoqing Xu|Bo Gao|Changwei Gu|Jianjun He|Tianxi Jia|Gang Le|Haichen Liu|Xiaolu Qiang|Jianjun Su|Li Tan|Tuo Tan|Di Wu|Xia Wu|Jianmin Zhang
title: El rey de los ni√±os
